title: US, Israel launch ‘Operation Epic Fury’ attack on Iran after regime refuses to scrap nuclear program — Trump vows to eliminate threats

Trump ends government use of Anthropic’s AI models, Bill Clinton says he knew nothing about Epstein’s crimes and the HBO investment-bank show “Industry” branches out. Read more in today’s What’s News newsletter:
